# Java Maven Sample

Minimal Spring Boot REST API for DevSecOps pipeline testing.

## Run Locally
```bash
mvn spring-boot:run
```

## Endpoints
| Method | Path         | Description     |
|--------|-------------|-----------------|
| GET    | /api/health | Health check    |
| GET    | /api/info   | Service info    |

## Test
```bash
mvn test
```
